short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that detects if a webpage is indicating a refusal for AI content scraping.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Discover instantly if a website prohibits the use of its content for AI training. "NoAI Status Checker" is a Chrome extension that provides real-time feedback on the AI usage permissions of a web page by analyzing its meta tags. Upon visiting a website, the extension icon changes to indicate whether the content is AI-friendly or not, and with a single click, you can get a more detailed view in the popup.
